name: SoftBistro
description:
SoftBistro is a boutique software development company providing an extension to your in-house team of developers. Staffing your projects with additional full-time resources and dedicated teams, we build each team around your specific needs. We’re ready to take on your simplest tasks to your most rigorous & complex projects. Our offering is dedicated, full-stack teams that specialize in Java, .Net, Ruby, Php, iOS, Android, DevOps, BI/DE and IT services.
We allocate each of our clients with a dedicated team that acts as an extension to your in-house team of developers.
Our engineers’ work is solely focused on your project at hand which proves beneficial to our clients.
Predictable budgets minimizing additional hiring costs
Flexibility of scope
Team management and daily communications
Deep understanding of project and goals
Team cohesion and stability 
We have served a broad range of clients across many markets: from start-ups in Silicon Valley, such as BigStock and Rafter to publicly traded ShutterStock, Chegg, and Freelancer.com; Additionally, large educational institutions such as California State University to governmental and non-for-profit organizations such as 20 Million Minds rely on SoftBistro for their engineering needs.
